description.raw:
Identical to https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/pull-requests/119/fix-build-on-homebrew-with-ffmpeg4/diff

Just when we had recovered from boost 1.67, ffmpeg4 has removed some macros. It's an easy fix though.

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_common-ci-ign-common1-homebrew-amd64&build=9)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_common-ci-ign-common1-homebrew-amd64/9/) ignition_common-ci-ign-common1-homebrew-amd64/9/

There are some new deprecation warnings though for the `avcodec_register_all` function, though I'm not sure what the recommended replacement is. I haven't addressed them.

* https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/commit/7e8eba2d8755962d9dca5eade57bf8f591a73c0c
